channel.title: Legit players will miss us BAD
channel.description: HAHA i find this hilarious, legit players are gonna be crying for months to come now that botting is dead. All we ever did was make price of goods cheaper and make it easyer for legit players to level and craft and cook and fletch and smith. Now im betting prices will skyrocket in a few days maybe a week. So this will be fun to see legit players squirm and complain to jagex once they realise bots helped them big time hahaha

and now theyre wanting us back cuz they need us… lol

item.title: Legit players will miss us BAD
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Blaqspade:

HAHA i find this hilarious, legit players are gonna be crying for months to come now that botting is dead. All we ever did was make price of goods cheaper

I stopped reading from there. Now, me as a legit player(go ahead, it’s an invitation to flame) think that 80gp/pure ess sucks.

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:21, topic:2933”][img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2800/lolzaidz0fp.jpg
[img]http://www.villavu.com/Pictures/Aryan.jpg[/quote]

I took the first picture, Fawaki the second.

(The guy with the pickaxe is me and was my nooby essminer that I hadn’t used in like 90 days.)

insult people you’ve never met and make references to them having sex and climaxing on you, then turning around and climaxing on them. your aware that they are probably guys, thus, your now officially gay. and you molest kids, since jagex is “9 yr olds”

the economy should go in ways that most people will like…even if certain prices rise, most players will be happier to pay more knowing that everyone else has suffered just as much (since there is no cheating)

item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

Bebemycat2:

Frankly, I never liked the way the majority of “botters” cheated, and I disagree with it. And for this, I am Fairly happy that Jagex have made this move. Disagree with me or not, I am only stating my opinion.

Agreed. It is perhaps a bit much to ask of RuneScape players, but a little self-restraint? As in, less of THIS
